articles.description: In the Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes, the Game of Thrones star will play the unfortunate soul who dooms a great many children.
articles.content: I certainly hope that Peter Dinklage enjoys a tipple or two. Otherwise, Im not especially sure why the actor, after playing Tyrion Lannister, the fan-favorite lush of Westeros, in Game of Thrones wou… [+2943 chars]

articles.author: Princess Weekes
articles.title: A (Light) Defense of Netflix's 'Persuasion'—Hold Your Pitchforks, Please - The Mary Sue
articles.description: Watching the newest adaptation of Persuasion get roasted by Jane Austen fans online was deeply amusing. I find it fascinating because whenever a new adaptation of Austen comes out it is divisive.
articles.content: Watching the newest adaptation of Persuasion get roasted by Jane Austen fans online was deeply amusing. As a lit major, I find it fascinating whenever a new Austen-inspired thing comes out because it… [+8261 chars]

articles.author: Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: A timeline of the 'Funny Girl' drama -- and how Lea Michele got there - CNN
articles.description: Between canceled revivals, accusations that Lea Michele was abusive to a Black "Glee" co-star and overwhelmingly negative reviews for Beanie Feldstein's performance, "Funny Girl's" return to Broadway has been besieged by setbacks. Revisit the winding chain of…
